name: The Rider
image: A young man on horseback, arriving at speed. The horse is in motion, the rider carries news or a message. The energy is forward, incoming, urgent.
as_person: A young man, a messenger, a courier, a lover arriving. Someone who brings news or change. An athletic or active person. Often the querent's younger male interest or a sibling figure.

modifier_behavior.as_modifier: Adds speed, news, arrival, or incoming energy to the card it touches. Whatever is next to the Rider is coming quickly or carries a message.
modifier_behavior.as_modified: The card's core meaning is arriving, being announced, or gaining urgency. What was distant or abstract becomes incoming and imminent.

topic_contexts.love: A new lover arriving, romantic news, a message from someone you're interested in. A date, a first meeting, or the return of a past flame. Love is coming to you.
topic_contexts.career: Job news, a new opportunity arriving, a quick professional development. An interview, offer, or assignment coming in fast. Career momentum.
topic_contexts.health: Health news arriving, test results, a new diagnosis or treatment option. Quick recovery. A health update—likely positive given the card's forward energy.
topic_contexts.finances: Financial news, a payment arriving, money coming in quickly. A financial opportunity or update. Short-term gains.
topic_contexts.spiritual: A message from spirit, a sign arriving, spiritual news or awakening. New spiritual practice or teacher entering your life. The universe is sending a messenger.

line_reading.as_first: News is coming. The reading opens with incoming energy—a message, a visitor, or a new beginning is the catalyst for everything that follows.
line_reading.as_middle: A message or arrival changes the dynamic. News enters the situation, a visitor shifts the energy, or speed picks up in the middle of the matter.
line_reading.as_last: The outcome is an arrival, a message, or a new beginning. Something is coming to you. Resolution comes quickly and with forward momentum.

combination_grammar.description: Fallback rules for combinations not explicitly listed. Use these to synthesize meaning when a specific pairing isn't in the combinations array.
combination_grammar.as_card_a: When The Rider appears BEFORE (left of) another card, it delivers news ABOUT Card B. The Rider announces, reveals, or brings Card B's energy to the querent. Think: 'news about [Card B]' or '[Card B] is arriving / incoming.'
combination_grammar.as_card_b: When The Rider appears AFTER (right of) another card, Card A's energy is being delivered or set in motion. Think: '[Card A] brings a message' or '[Card A] arrives quickly.' Card A rides in on horseback.
combination_grammar.with_positive_card: Good news, a welcome visitor, a fortunate arrival. The message is one you want to hear. Speed works in your favor.
combination_grammar.with_negative_card: Bad news, an unwelcome visitor, a disruption arriving fast. The message stings or the arrival creates problems. Speed works against you.
combination_grammar.with_person_card: That person is arriving, sending a message, or is the subject of news. They're on their way or have something to tell you.
combination_grammar.with_object_card: That thing or concept is arriving, being delivered, or is the subject of a message. It's incoming—expect it soon.

combinations.as_first: Lucky news arrives, a fortunate message, a visitor bringing small blessings. Good news comes quickly.
combinations.as_second: Luck triggers a message, a fortunate encounter leads to news, a small stroke of luck arrives on horseback.

combinations.as_first: Travel news arrives, a journey is announced, a foreign visitor is coming. A trip is set in motion by incoming information.
combinations.as_second: News prompts travel, a message about departure, a quick journey begins. Information drives movement forward.

combinations.as_first: News about home, a domestic visitor, a message about family or property. Someone is coming to the house.
combinations.as_second: Home triggers a message, family sends a visitor, domestic matters prompt news. The rider arrives at the doorstep.

combinations.as_first: Confusing news, unclear message, a visitor who brings uncertainty. The message is muddled or ambiguous.
combinations.as_second: Confusion triggers a message, uncertainty sends a rider, unclear circumstances prompt an arrival. The news comes through fog.

combinations.as_first: News of an ending, a message about closure, a visitor bringing finality. Something stops arriving.
combinations.as_second: An ending sends a final message, closure triggers one last visit, finality rides in. The last rider.

combinations.as_first: A pleasant message, a gift arriving, an invitation delivered. The news is welcome and socially gracious.
combinations.as_second: A gift prompts a visit, an invitation brings a rider, beauty triggers a message. The arrival is charming.

combinations.as_first: Deceptive news, a message with hidden motives, a visitor who isn't what they seem. Don't trust this at face value.
combinations.as_second: Deception triggers a message, cunning prompts a visit, a fox sends a rider. The news has teeth behind its smile.

combinations.as_first: News from a friend, a loyal visitor, a message of friendship or trust. A friend is arriving.
combinations.as_second: A friend brings news, loyalty delivers a message, trust triggers an arrival. The friend rides in.

combinations.as_first: Love letter, romantic news, a lover arriving. The message is one of passion or emotional significance.
combinations.as_second: Love brings a message, the heart sends a rider, romance triggers an arrival. Love is the news.

combinations.as_first: A fast letter, an urgent document, news arriving in written form. The message is official or documented.
combinations.as_second: A document triggers a visit, paperwork sends a rider, written communication arrives with urgency.

combinations.as_first: News about a man, a man is arriving, a message from a specific man. A young man brings word of an older or more established man.
combinations.as_second: A man brings news, a man is the messenger, a male visitor arrives. The man himself is the delivery.

combinations.as_first: News about a woman, a woman is arriving, a message from a specific woman. Word comes regarding her.
combinations.as_second: A woman brings news, a woman is the messenger, a female visitor arrives. The woman herself is the delivery.

combinations.as_first: News about a child or new beginning, a small message arrives, a young visitor. Something new and small is incoming.
combinations.as_second: A new beginning brings news, a child delivers a message, a fresh start triggers arrival. Innocence rides in.

combinations.as_first: Wonderful news, joyful message, a visitor who brings happiness and success. The best possible news arrives.
combinations.as_second: Success brings a message, joy triggers an arrival, happiness rides in. The news is radiant.

combinations.as_first: Worrying news, a message that causes anxiety, a visitor who diminishes something. The news erodes confidence.
combinations.as_second: Anxiety triggers a message, worry sends a rider, small losses prompt an arrival. The news gnaws.

combinations.as_first: News of change, a message about transformation, a visitor who brings transition. Something is shifting and the news confirms it.
combinations.as_second: Change triggers a message, transformation sends a rider, a shift in circumstances brings news. The change arrives.

grand_tableau.as_house: The House of News — Cards landing here speak to what messages, visitors, or new beginnings are coming for the querent. This house asks: what's arriving? What news is on its way?
grand_tableau.near_significator: News is imminent. A message, visitor, or new beginning is front and center in the querent's life. Something is arriving fast.
grand_tableau.far_from_significator: News is delayed, distant, or not yet relevant. The message hasn't been sent yet, or the visitor is far away. Patience required.
grand_tableau.diagonal_or_corner: News or messages operate as background influence—not the main story, but subtly shaping it. A message is in the periphery, waiting to be noticed.
